name: Be My Muse [Demo]
description:
You join an art exhibition at your local art museum, and while trying to get away from the crowd, you meet a strange man who, for some reason, really wants to paint a portrait of you.

This is a demo made for the 2023 Yandere Game Jam. I will be releasing the full game hopefully in a month.

This game also acts as a prequel to a future visual novel I plan to make called Let Me Remind You.

Content warning: 
This is a yandere horror visual novel. The demo contains depiction of blood, as well as a character who manipulates and gaslights the player. The full game will contain depictions of death. Viewer discretion is advised.

Current Demo features:

  • Three characters.
  • Original artwork for backgrounds and characters.

Full game plans:

  • More fleshed out characters.
  • 5 different endings.
  • More original art and locations/scenes.
  • Original music.
  • Maybe voice acting? I'll have to see first.

Credits:

  • Sound effects from: Freesound
  • Music by A Tape Full of Mistakes from Loyaltyfreakmusic
